CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "ACA"), "ACA", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "TOC"), "TOC", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "CN"), "CN", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "BE"), "BE", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "BME"), "BME", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "JAVA"), "JAVA", NULL) + BR() + IF(INCLUDES( StudentID__r.Subjects__c , "OOPS"), "OOPS", NULL)
CustomField.label: Subjects
